Function reference

All functions

AddMarkerExpressionPct()
filter uniquely expressed markers by expression percentage
Bt2mBifucation.graph()
Bifurcation based on graph-based clustering
Bt2mBifucation.hclust()
Bifurcation based on hierarchical clustering
Bt2mBifucation.kmeans()
Bifurcation based on K-means clustering
Bt2mColors()
Colors for bt2m
Bt2mEnrichGO()
Perform GO annotation of bt2m.marker.chain dataframe
DEG.cluster.list()
A general function to identify DEGs between case and control
DataframeToVector()
transform dataframe to vector
DrawBarplotGO()
Draw barplot for GO annotation
DrawBt2mClusterTree()
Draw cluster tree/chain by clustree
DrawGOchain()
Get GO chain corresponding to a cluster chain
DrawMarkerChainDotplot()
Draw cluster tree/chain by clustree
DrawMarkerChainHeatmap()
Draw heatmap by ComplexHeatmap
FindBifurcationResolution()
Find the best resolution for bifurcation in graph-based clustering
GetClusterChain()
Find the cluster chain of any given cluster
GetInitialBifurcation()
Find initial bifurcation event of any two clusters in bt2m.cellMeta
GetTestData()
Download raw single-cell matrix for testing
HGNC.gene.pairs
Mouse transcription factors
IdentifyBinaryMarkers()
Identify binary markers
JASPAR.motif.rmDup
Human ligand and receptor
MGI.gene.pairs
Human transcription factors
OrderCluster()
order the clusters according to similarity inside the bt2m result
PrepareExpressionMatrix()
Prepare expression matrix for heatmap visualization, estimate the overall expression of marker modules
RemoveDuplicatedGO()
remove duplicated GO terms based on overlaps of genes
RemoveDuplicatedMarker()
Remove duplicated markers (just for plotting)
RenameBt2m()
rename the clusters inside the bt2m result
RunBt2m()
The main function to perform iteratively bifurcation clustering
WriteBt2mIntoSeurat()
Write bt2m result to Seurat object
add.missing.genes()
Add mising genes to the gene expression matrix (for multiple datasets integraiton)
clusterProfilerORA()
GO KEGG ORA analysis by clusterProfiler
gene.anno.GRCh38.v3
Gene annotation for human genome
gene.anno.mm10.v3
Gene annotation for mouse genome
lr.pair.all.uniq.hs
Mouse ligand and receptor
lr.pair.all.uniq.mm
Mouse ligand and receptor
subsetSeuratObj()
Subset seurat object by cell names
subset_cells()
a subset function for seurat obj, origninal cannot work sometimes
